sentence.text: MESP2, mesoderm development and inactivation of MAPK activity genes have been proved to be involved in the etiopathogenesis of congenital scoliosis (CS) in animal embryo studies, however, whether this association was detected in human CS patients also remains unknown.
regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, HES7 and inactivation of MAPK activity genes may not be involved in the etiopathogenesis of sporadic and non-syndromic CS in Chinese Han population

entity.text: regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
